title: tale art for director reynolds and mable lenora
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

> I was bored this afternoon... so I created cover art for two of my tales in the Twin Sites/Lightspeed Inc Series!  You can find more character art [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:site-404-403-character-designs here], if you're interested! 

[[=]]
+ [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/director-emerald-reynolds-guide-to-containing-reality-using Director Emerald Reynolds' Guide To Containing Reality Using Tetris]
